page.title: 13Wild Plants of Llangeitho
page.content: There are many interesting wild plants around Llangeitho.Carpets of beautiful{Bluebells}are found under the natural{oak}woods around the village.Ivies,50 or 60 feet long hang down from the oak trees. The roadside verges are a picture in the spring and summer with{Red {Campions,Greater Stitchwort,Geums {Caraway,Dog Roses,Violets,Speedwells, and{Foxgloves}providing a feast of colour.Most of the wild flowers in the fields have vanished because of re-seeding and heavy fertilising but there are still many small fields which are a mass of{Yellow Rattle,Ox {Eye Daisies,and Caraway}in June. Orchids such as the{Green {Hellorborine,Heath Spotted and Green {Winged}still occur plentifully on undisturbed land around Llangeitho.
